attributes.action: Bring the tax on fuel in line with the price charged by the USA
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The united States of America was created because of the dangerous way in which this country believed it could tax colonial's, this caused resentment and an eventual war which caused the break up of the first British Empire, The United States of America has prospered continually because of this decision to keep taxes low continually throughout it's history.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
